item.title: Predictive Modelling
item.description: Predictive Modelling Predictive Analytics, Machine Learning, and AI are at the forefront of organizational initiatives across just about every industry today. While they might be the hottest topics around right now, Alba Intelligence have been building predictive models since before it was deep learning was the thing, and have been on top of the leading-edge advances in the field that are happening every day. â€‹Our team is armed with a decade of model-building experience, including statistical & probabilistic models, graph analysis, machine learning, recommendation engines, and risk forecasting.
